hero.title: Welcome to LuminaKraft Launcher
hero.subtitle: Discover amazing modpacks and join our community

featured.title: Featured Modpacks
featured.empty: No featured modpacks available at the moment

modpacks.title: Modpacks
modpacks.checkConnection: Check your connection and try refreshing the list
modpacks.refreshDisabledDuringInstall: Cannot refresh while a modpack is installing
modpacks.removeConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}}? This will delete all files associated with this modpack.
modpacks.logsWillAppear: Logs will appear here when the modpack starts
modpacks.carouselHint: Use arrows or click dots to navigate

errors.zipFileNotFound: Modpack file not found or corrupted
errors.corruptedFile: Downloaded file appears to be corrupted
errors.curseforgeUnauthorized: CurseForge API authentication failed. The launcher is not authorized to access mod data. Please try again later or contact support.
errors.curseforgeForbidden: CurseForge API access forbidden. The launcher does not have permission to access this content.
errors.curseforgeApiError: Failed to connect to CurseForge API. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.contactSupport: If the problem persists, contact support

settings.title: Settings
settings.minecraftAccountHelp: Your Minecraft account (Premium or Offline) is managed directly from the sidebar. Click your player head/avatar in the sidebar to switch accounts or login.
settings.luminakraftAccountHelp: This account manages your profile, modpack publishing, and social features on the LuminaKraft platform.
settings.enableAnimationsDesc: Disable animations for better performance on low-end devices or personal preference
settings.languageDescription: Language changes will be applied immediately throughout the application
settings.languageDisabledDuringOperations: Language cannot be changed while modpacks are being installed, updated, or launched
settings.usernameDescription: This name will be used for Minecraft offline mode
settings.usernameInvalidToast: Please enter a valid username (1-16 characters)
settings.javaPathDescription: Leave empty to use automatic Java detection
settings.ramAllocationDesc: Amount of RAM allocated to Minecraft
settings.ramNote: Note: Allocating too much RAM can be counterproductive. Most modpacks work well with 4-8 GB.
settings.dataUrlDesc: Remote URL to fetch modpack data
settings.clearCacheDesc: Clears locally stored data to force an update
settings.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings?
settings.settingsDescription: Customize your experience with LuminaKraft Launcher
settings.dataUrlDescription: URL where modpack data is obtained from
settings.invalidJava: Invalid or unsupported Java executable selected
settings.enablePrereleasesDesc: Allow receiving alpha, beta, and release candidate versions. These versions may contain bugs and are intended for testing.
settings.displayNameDesc: This is shown throughout the launcher and on your public profile
settings.usingDiscordAvatar: Using Discord avatar. Link a different provider or upload custom image.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: Choose your authentication method for Minecraft. Microsoft authentication allows you to access premium servers and keep your skin and cape.
auth.microsoftDescription: Sign in with your Microsoft account to access Minecraft. The browser will open automatically.
auth.pleaseWait: Please wait while we authenticate your account
auth.pleaseWaitLink: Please wait while we link your account
auth.pleaseWaitAuth: This will only take a moment
auth.tokenExpiredDescription: Your session has expired, you need to refresh the token
auth.minecraftAccountDesc: Manage how you play the game
auth.offlineModeDescription: You are using offline mode. Some premium servers might not be available.
auth.usernameFromMicrosoft: Username obtained from your Microsoft account
auth.refreshFailed: Failed to refresh token. Please authenticate again.
auth.authTimeout: Authentication timed out. Please try again.
auth.discordDescription: Link your Discord account to publish modpacks and join our community
auth.discordSyncFailed: Failed to sync Discord roles. Please re-link your Discord account.
auth.confirmUnlinkDiscord: Are you sure you want to unlink your Discord account? You won't be able to publish modpacks until you link it again.
auth.discordJoinRequired: Join our Discord server to unlock publishing features
auth.rolesNeedSync: Your roles haven't been synced in a while. Click 'Sync Roles' to refresh.
auth.discordLinkDescription: Link your Discord account to access exclusive features and publish modpacks to the LuminaKraft community.
auth.discordBenefit1: Publish your own modpacks to the community
auth.discordBenefit2: Get partner benefits and special roles
auth.discordBenefit3: Join our community and get support
auth.confirmSignOut: Are you sure you want to sign out of your LuminaKraft account?
auth.confirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
auth.cannotUnlinkOnlyProvider: Cannot unlink your only sign-in method

about.title: About
about.descriptionLong: A custom modpack launcher for the LuminaKraft Studios community. Designed to make modpack installation and management simple and efficient.
about.newUpdateDesc: A new version of the launcher is available for download.
about.feature2Desc: Keep your modpacks always up to date
about.feature3Desc: Each modpack in its own folder
about.feature4: Support for premium and non-premium users
about.feature4Desc: Works with both premium and non-premium accounts
about.feature8Desc: Support for mods not available on CurseForge
about.feature9Desc: Intuitive and easy to use design
about.upToDate: You are using the latest version
about.restartRequired: Restart required to apply the update
about.prereleaseWarning: This is a pre-release version that may contain bugs and is intended for testing
about.prereleaseUpdateDesc: A new pre-release version is available. Pre-release versions may contain bugs and are intended for testing purposes.
about.minecraftTrademark: Minecraft is a registered trademark of Mojang Studios

failedMods.title: Unavailable Files
failedMods.description: The following files (mods/resourcepacks) could not be downloaded because they are not available for public download. Click on each link to go directly to the download page and add the files manually to the appropriate folders (mods/ or resourcepacks/):

metaStorage.title: Storage
metaStorage.cleanupDescription: Remove unused cached files to free up disk space.
metaStorage.cleanupConfirm: Are you sure you want to cleanup the cache? This will remove cached files.

update.prereleaseBanner: This is a pre-release version intended for testing and development. Please report any issues you encounter.
update.alphaDesc: This alpha version may contain bugs and is intended for early testing. Use with caution.
update.betaDesc: This beta version is more stable than alpha but may still contain issues.
update.rcDesc: This release candidate is near final quality but should still be tested before production use.
update.newVersionDesc: A new version of LuminaKraft Launcher is available!
update.downloadNote: Click "Download Update" to open the download page in your browser.

empty.title: No local modpacks yet
empty.description: Import a CurseForge or Modrinth modpack to get started

rateLimit.linkDiscordDesc: Link your Discord account to increase your download limit from 10 to 50 downloads per hour
rateLimit.linkDiscordAuthDesc: Sign in and link your Discord account to get 50 downloads per hour instead of just 3
rateLimit.benefit3: Join our community and get support

publishedModpacks.title: Publish Modpacks
publishedModpacks.subtitle: Publish and manage your modpacks on the platform

auth.title: Publish Modpacks
auth.description: Share your custom modpacks with the entire LuminaKraft community. Publish, manage, and track your modpacks all in one place.
auth.requiredDesc: To publish and manage modpacks, you need to link your Discord account and join our Discord server. This ensures you're part of our community and allows you to manage your published content.
auth.localAlternative: Just want to manage modpacks locally?

empty.title: No published modpacks yet
empty.description: Publish your first modpack to share it with the community

deleteDialog.title: Delete Modpack?
deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone and will remove the modpack from the platform.
